name: Deck of Cards
description:
An open source deck of cards, free to use in commercial and personal projects. Perfect for indie game developers and game studios who need a deck of cards to play along with. All suits are components and come in one Emoji Style. Planning on adding more styles in the future. All cards have export settings for @1x, @2x and @3x. All cards are designed for @3x and smaller versions are scaled down on export. GLHF!


Updates

6 April, 2022

  • Added a card back side design
